name: MediaManager
author: maxdorninger
description: A manager for your media files.

form_fields.label: Admin Email
form_fields.hint: The email address of the admin user.

form_fields.label: qBittorrent Host
form_fields.hint: The hostname or IP address of the qBittorrent instance.

form_fields.label: qBittorrent Port
form_fields.hint: The port number of the qBittorrent instance.

form_fields.label: qBittorrent Username
form_fields.hint: The username for the qBittorrent instance.

form_fields.label: qBittorrent Password
form_fields.hint: The password for the qBittorrent instance.
